agents

Class Percept

  • java.lang.Object
    • agents.Agent
      • agents.SystemAgent
        • agents.Percept
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Percept
extends SystemAgent
implements java.io.Serializable
    Percept agent is in charge of the communication with the environment. Each Percept agent must be connected to one data source.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
